attachments.title: Satellite-Free NFL Sunday Ticket For Xbox, PS4, Tablets: Coming Soon?
attachments.text: NFL Sunday Ticket has always been notoriously inaccessible, limited to just DirecTV subscribers and people who bought a copy of Madden last year. It sucks. But that looks like it's about to change. A page that's turned up on the DirecTV website says satellite-free packages of Sunday Ticket will be offered next year.
attachments.fallback: Deadspin: Satellite-Free NFL Sunday Ticket For Xbox, PS4, Tablets: Coming Soon?

text: Hmmm, that's really interesting. Wish more channels would consider this - I'd pay like $5 a month for HBO
